name: Fill the Box
description:
• ASMR satisfying game
  • Press "Space" to fill the box, click on the balls or drag them to play with them.
  • I own all the assets and the scripts made in this game
  •  Full project will be posted here, https://github.com/DisrespectCodes

Theme 1:

  • Trust the process, things will be shaky and out of place in the process.

Theme 2:

  • How a fluid molecules behaves in an enclosed space.
